name: Alone (itch) (Cmski)
description:
Waking up again, you live the last moments of your life. Can you escape before...waking up again, you live the last moments of your life. Can you escape before...waking up again...

-A point & click adventure, stuck in a time loop, set in space.

-Made for the itch.io 1 minute game jam

Controls:

WASD/Space/Mouse
